Name: NOTHING TO LOSE
About the game: NOTHING TO LOSE is a retro horror and adventure game. Mask was infected with the virus when he was attacked by zombies during his mission. The time left for Mask is only the last 60 minutes! Either find the antidote, or mutate into a zombie! In the game, players will operate the brave Mask to fight fiercely in a world full of zombies and monsters. At the same time, Mask has to face various puzzles and find guns and supplies in order to survive.
